timeline.message:
Added EGit dialogs for commit and updated - (Task #708)

- Git update handlers now pass the results from the last push / update
action on to EGit for proper user feedback on UI level

---
Task #708: Problems with GitBackend deleting files and quietly denying
push

Fixing git to deal with remote commits on update - (Task #708)

- Added code that the simplified VirSat Update on the git backend is
dealign with conflicts on the pull.
- Switched to the standard RECURSIVE merge strategy usually used by Git.
It is usually quite powerful.
- Added code, thus in case of remaining conflicts the truth will be seen
in the remote Repository. And conflicting files will be replaced by it.

---
Task #708: Problems with GitBackend deleting files and quietly denying
push

Merge branch 'feature/task_708-Problems_with_GitBack_Update_Fix' into
feature/task_708-Problems_with_GitBack

Conflicts:
	de.dlr.sc.virsat.team/src/de/dlr/sc/virsat/team/git/VirSatGitVersionControlBackend.java

Added test case for conflict resolution in backends - (Task #708)

- Added test case that creates a merge conflict and tests that the
remote version is taken to resolve the conflict
- Extended test cases to also check that non-conflicting files are
preserved
- Implemented tested conflict resolution in SVN backend

---
Task #708: Problems with GitBackend deleting files and quietly denying
push

Adapted SWTBot Test Cases EGit dialogs - (Task #708)

- Closing the EGit dialogues after commit / update operations in git

---
Task #708: Problems with GitBackend deleting files and quietly denying
push

Extracted method for conflict resolution in git backend - (Task #708)

Git and SVN backends now properly resolve merge conflicts and dialogs show backend errors

Task #691: Release Version 4.12.0

Fixing Incremental Builder on external runs - (Task #714)

- Added a SaveTrigger to incremental builder to individually set if the
whole ResourceSet should be saved.
- Adjusted InheritacneBuilder to only save on changes on DVLM reosurces
- Fixed CalculationBuilder to only save on changes on DVLM Reosurces.
- Added a new test case to check the save trigger.

---

editor in a dirty mode

Task #124: Release 4.12.0

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to disable this rule or was this just somehow for the release?
timeline.author: franzTobiasDLR

replies.bodyText: And if we don't want to have it why not deleting it?
replies.author: franzTobiasDLR

replies.bodyText: Nice catch. We only disabled it temporarily for debugging, its supposd to be renabled,
replies.author: SaMuellerDLR

timeline.message:
Reenabling timeout rule which was disabled for debugging - (Task #124)


---
Task #124: Release 4.12.0

timeline.bodyText: Inconsistent API - to set it to false I need to change the field directly, to set to true there is a setter. I suggest either remove the setter or add a parameter to it
timeline.author: andriikovalov-dlr

replies.bodyText: Made API clearer, inherting builders should only be able to set it to true so changed the name of the "setter" and made the variable private.
replies.author: SaMuellerDLR
